entries.title: Refined Icon Category Taxonomy
entries.content:
Changed

  • Refined icon category taxonomy to improve clarity, scalability, and discoverability.
  • Narrowed the scope of the general category to focus on core UI utilities and system level primitives.
  • Re scoped symbol to represent semantic meaning, status, warnings, reactions, and abstract concepts rather than functional controls.
  • Reclassified multiple icons across categories to better align with their primary intent and usage context.

Notes

  • No icons were removed in this release.
  • This release focuses on structural consistency rather than visual changes.
  • Existing icon names and styles remain unchanged.

entries.title: New calendar and circuit icons with refinements
entries.content:
Added

  • general-calendar-alt-2 in filled and outline styles
  • general-circuit-line in filled style

Changed

  • general-target-alt filled style updated
  • general-skull-poison filled and outline styles updated

entries.title: Some Icons 1.0 Launch
entries.content:
Added

  • First stable public release of the Some Icons icon set
  • Initial curated set of icons released under a unified design system
  • Outline and filled styles available at launch
  • Core categories and tags implemented for search and filtering

Design System

  • Consistent grid and geometry across all icons
  • Harmonized stroke weight and corner radii between styles
  • Designed for clarity and legibility at common UI sizes

Supported Platforms

  • Website library browser
  • Figma plugin for direct insertion and export

License

  • Released under the MIT License
  • Free for personal and commercial use

Notes

  • Some icons are still undergoing refinement and may receive visual adjustments in future releases
  • Icon names and IDs introduced in this release are considered stable unless explicitly noted in future changelogs
